sentences: It was founded in 2008 by producers Mike Zaplatosch and Andy Garcia (formerly Zapp & Vice) and Billboard Reporting DJ Jeremy Martorano.
Jeremy has been DJing for 17 years and retouches much of what he plays to give it a hi-NRG, "hands in the air" sound.
Rihanna "Breakin Dishes 2009" (Island) PROMO #4 Billboard Club Chart
